trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo"></xref> object that inherits from <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfoBase"></xref> used for the service operation information of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity"></xref> activities.
Note that this operation information must be based on a CLR type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref> class.
The type of the associated contract interface.
The method name of the associated service operation.
Creates a copy of the current object.
The type of the associated contract interface.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object that represents the type of the associated contract interface.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref> instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref>.
`true` if the instances are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Generates a number that corresponds to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the hash code value of the object.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.TypedOperationInfo"></xref> object.
